name: Lost Princess: Winterland
description:
Story:


Play this FPS walking simulation where mission is to collect hidden items to get achievements. Princess are again lost in big snow world and player mission is to find princess to finish journey. Game contains also several other collectable items which gives player steam achievements So explorer big open snow world and try to find all hidden objects

Features:

- lot of collectable items which gives steam achievements
- Relax and big snow world
- Snow world contains several different villages
